content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Juan, thank you for your interest in the apartment. I understand that you are looking for a place to rent and I am happy to help you find a suitable solution. In terms of the rental price, I am looking for a fair and competitive rate that will allow me to maximize my gains as a landlord. Would you be able to provide me with an offer for the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 250 Euros per month. I am willing to sign the lease immediately.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your offer, Juan. I appreciate your willingness to sign the lease immediately. I will need to review the offer and consider it further. In the meantime, please let me know if there are any other details or requirements that I should be aware of. Once I have made a decision, I will let you know.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 250 Euros per month. I am willing to sign the lease immediately.

I am sorry but I am not able to agree to the price of 250 Euros per month. I need to consider my budget and I am not able to afford that price. I would like to negotiate the rental price. Would you be able to provide me with a lower price?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: I understand your concerns, Juan. I am willing to negotiate the rental price to find a solution that works for both of us. Can you provide me with a lower price that you are comfortable with? I will do my best to find a mutually beneficial agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine
